name: Air Funnel
description: Technique to create a cannon for small projectiles.

name: Asphyxiation
description: Manipulates the flow of air within a person's respiratory system and prevents any new intake of breath by forming a ball of air around the head.

name: Earth Sink
description: Make the person sink to the ground.

name: Surface Rocks
description: Largse rocks used as projectiles of Royal Earthbender Guards.

name: Combustionbending
description: Ignite objects with their mind instead of traditional firebending methods.

name: Shozin Comet
description: Formerly known as the Great Comet. A celestial object that passes close to the Earth every one hundred years, just skimming the surface of the upper atmosphere.

name: Club
description: A blunt force weapon used for striking. Mostly used by Sokka.

name: Ice Prison
description: This technique covers an opponent in a prison made of ice.

name: Divine Punishment
description: Take the person's bending ability as a form of punishment.
